messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

weekly for existing and prospect clients unable to access location sent monday weekly for existing prospect clients unable access location importance high dear tried access several times link below for shared locations for but only have encountered error message while trying access could you please investigate needs web thank you best officer ext sent thursday weekly for existing prospect clients importance high dear we should have set meetings for planning accounts existing prospect clients meetings scheduled start after month exec meeting rd have granted write access for sales needs spreadsheet needs web kindly ask you follow below instructions for using needs spreadsheet please save close document you finish your updates order allow other make their changes case you encounter any issues when save please make another copy document could cause confusion one latest make copy ask help order save your changes if have missed any client or anything please let know regards th floor blvd district

I've focused on the error messages and "unable to access" phrases, leading me to conclude that the correct classification is "Access." The "write access" mention, though present, is secondary to the primary access problem.
